clintock:AAKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Amino acids (AA) are the structural units that make up proteins.

clintock:BindKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Consumes sugar and phosphate to put a nucleobase in an empty orb slot. If there are no empty slots, an amino acid is first generated.

clintock:CytosineKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Red nucleobase. Deals damage to a random enemy.

clintock:EssentialKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Amino acids that must be supplied in diet. See the Clintock wiki for a complete list.

clintock:FluorophoreKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Increases the potency of bound nucleobases.

clintock:NonessentialKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Amino acids that can be synthesized in the body. See the Clintock wiki for a complete list.

clintock:NucleobaseKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Fundamental units of the genetic code found in DNA (Adenine, Cytosine, Guanine, Thymine).

clintock:NucleosideKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Does not require sugar when binding.

clintock:PeptideChainKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Group of amino acids that activate at the end of each turn.

clintock:PhosphateKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Phosphorus bound to four oxygen residues. Essential molecule in generating nucleotides.

clintock:SugarKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Specifically deoxyribose. Essential molecule in generating nucleotides.

clintock:ThymineKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Yellow nucleobase. Deals damage to ALL enemies.
